cause.description:
This foundation was created in honour of Pat McFarlane who passed away from cancer in 2000. It's purpose is to raise money to go directly to cancer research.
www.patmcfarlane.com
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oa0PrJl30YM&mode=related&search=
This program wont let us link to the site for donations so if you're interested in donating let myself or Aimee know.
1. Raise Awareness of Cancer
2. Raise Funds to fight Cancer
3. Continue her loving legacy
cause.name: Pat McFarlane Cancer Research Foundation
